sections.title: Steve DeAnda
sections.summary: This is where I write what I am good at and my experience. I can talk about my learning and how I am ready for an opportunity to work. I can talk about the projects I have worked on. I can talk about my past jobs and how they give me good on the job experince for this new position.

tasks: Design a layout of where to install cameras.
Teach Client how to use system and answer any questions they may have regarding, camera views, camera recording and retrieving footage.
Submit expense reports when traveling out of city.
